name: nextcloud-news
description: Nextcloud News is an RSS/Atom feed reader app integrated into a Nextcloud instance. It can sync across devices, categorize feeds, and offers simple offline reading capabilities.
features: RSS/Atom reader: Subscribe to news feeds and blogs with automatic update checking.
Feed organization: Group feeds into folders for structured content management.
Cross-device sync: Read articles on web, desktop, or mobile with synchronized read status.
Offline reading: Download articles for reading without internet connection on mobile apps.
Unread management: Mark articles as read automatically or manually with flexible options.
Star articles: Save favorite articles for later reference or archival.
Keyboard navigation: Browse feeds efficiently with customizable keyboard shortcuts.
Feed discovery: Find and subscribe to feeds from website URLs automatically.
Import/export: Migrate subscriptions from other readers using OPML format.
API access: Connect third-party RSS clients via compatible API for extended functionality.
Nextcloud integration: Unified authentication and interface within Nextcloud ecosystem.
Compact view: Choose between expanded or compact article layouts for reading preference.
